headline: Agoda Maps Asia's Appetite for Regional Food-Focused Tourism as Hoteliers Eat Up the Benefits
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda reveals data-driven insights to help hoteliers attract and engage guests, with regional food-focused tourism emerging as a trend across Asia. Japan ranks as the top searched destination for food and drink activities, based on search data from June to July 2025. Thailand takes second place, followed by Vietnam, Indonesia, and Malaysia rounding out the top five.
